>>> slist = sorted(lineList)
>>> slist
[58, 96, 316, 467, 476, 502, 615, 783, 844, 864, 866, 903, 1229, 1233, 1235, 1239, 1244, 1249, 1251, 1257, 1263, 1266, 1273, 1290, 1292, 1295, 1300, 1305, 1314, 1327, 1335, 1337, 1346, 1348, 1357, 1362, 1368, 1370, 1373, 1376, 1378, 1398, 1420, 1437, 1445, 1451, 1470, 1480, 1521, 1550, 1559, 1561, 1564, 1578, 1580, 1581, 1583, 1584, 1589, 1599, 1600, 1606, 1615, 1621, 1626, 1628, 1629, 1637, 1642, 1643, 1645, 1647, 1648, 1656, 1657, 1659, 1660, 1663, 1665, 1666, 1667, 1669, 1670, 1671, 1675, 1678, 1680, 1685, 1691, 1694, 1696, 1697, 1704, 1706, 1707, 1708, 1713, 1715, 1717, 1719, 1723, 1730, 1734, 1741, 1743, 1745, 1747, 1750, 1754, 1755, 1756, 1758, 1761, 1763, 1765, 1766, 1769, 1771, 1775, 1777, 1778, 1783, 1785, 1788, 1791, 1796, 1822, 1825, 1831, 1834, 1838, 1844, 1845, 1847, 1850, 1857, 1860, 1862, 1869, 1873, 1879, 1882, 1892, 1898, 1901, 1909, 1914, 1929, 1930, 1935, 1938, 1944, 1946, 1950, 1951, 1952, 1954, 1955, 1956, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1963, 1964, 1965, 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972, 1975, 1977, 1978, 1979, 1980, 1982, 1983, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1990, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2006, 2008, 2009]

### no need to throw out numbers too big, by inspection...
>>> slist[0]
58
>>> slist[199]
2009

end = myLen(slist)
for a in range(end):
    x = 2020 - slist[a]
    try:
        for b in range(a,end):
            try:
                for c in range(b,end):
                    if ((slist[a] + slist[b] + slist[c]) == 2020): 
                        print("Found a trio: ", slist[a], slist[b], slist[c], " !!!")
                        print()
                        print(" their product is: ",slist[a], " x ", slist[b], " x ", slist[c], " = ", slist[a] * slist[b] * slist[c])
                    else:
                        pass
            except:
                pass
    except:
        pass


---------------------------
[answer to part two:]

Found a trio:  502 615 903  !!!

 their product is:  502  x  615  x  903  =  278783190

--------------------------
[answer to part one:]

316, 1704
1704, 316
